alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Bladen and northeastern Robeson Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jerome, or 16 miles northwest of Elizabethtown, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Bladen Community College, Tolarsville, Duart, Ammon, Tobermory, Ruskin, White Oak, Jerome, White Lake, Dublin, Tar Heel and Bladen County Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
